About Us

At Socielo Tech, our mission is to empower businesses through innovative technology solutions that enhance customer relationships and drive growth. We believe in creating platforms that not only address the challenges of today’s market but also pave the way for future advancements in customer engagement.


We believe that true innovation lies in the ability to see beyond the challenges of today and to create solutions that will inspire progress for years to come. Our team is dedicated to pushing the boundaries of customer engagement, developing products that are not only powerful but also intuitive and user-friendly. By leveraging the latest advancements in cloud technology, data security, and user experience.


At the heart of Socielo Tech’s approach is a commitment to building long-term partnerships based on trust, transparency, and a shared vision for success. We are passionate about supporting businesses on their journey to create meaningful connections, foster customer loyalty, and drive sustainable growth through technology.

Our Vision

We envision a world where businesses can seamlessly connect with their customers, fostering lasting relationships built on trust and reliability. Our flagship product, Relaso, embodies this vision, providing a highly secure and user-friendly cloud-based CRM solution designed to support organizations in acquiring new customers, retaining existing ones, and expanding their service offerings.



Checkout our products

Commitment to Security and Reliability

Data security is at the heart of everything we do. We prioritize safeguarding our clients’ information with robust security measures, including redundant RAID-10 hardware for instant backups, daily offsite backups, and dual firewalls to protect against threats. Our commitment to reliability ensures that our clients can access their data anytime, anywhere, allowing them to focus on what truly matters: building strong relationships with their customers.

Our Founder

Angsuman Chakraborty, our founder, brings over 28 years of extensive experience in software architecture, design, and development. With a rich background working with Fortune 500 companies and startups alike, Angsuman has a proven track record of innovation. He played a pivotal role at DoubleTwist Inc., contributing to groundbreaking projects, including the first worldwide annotation of the human genome. He holds a B.Tech (Honors) from the Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur, and is a Sun Certified Architect for Java Technologies.

Meet The Team

Our team is comprised of seasoned professionals dedicated to driving excellence in technology development. Under the leadership of John Doe, who heads the Engineering Team with a focus on Quality Assurance and Product Management, we leverage a blend of expertise in engineering and quality assurance. With degrees in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science, John Doe has held significant roles at esteemed organizations, enhancing our commitment to delivering exceptional solutions.
